sentences.en: a lake, still and serene in the sunlight
sentences.cn: 阳光下宁静安谧的湖水

sentences.en: He didn't speak much, he just smiled with that serene smile of his.
sentences.cn: 他话不多，只是脸上露出他招牌式的淡定的微笑。

sentences.en: He has entered the serene autumn of his life.
sentences.cn: 他已进入了美好的中年时期.

sentences.en: In North China , however, it is particularly, limpid, serene and melancholy.
sentences.cn: 可是啊, 北国的秋, 却特别地来得清,来得静, 来得悲凉.

sentences.en: In spite of the panic, she remained serene and in control.
sentences.cn: 尽管人心惶惶, 但她却泰然自若.

sentences.en: In spite of their ceremouies, the sky remained serene.
sentences.cn: 不管他们搞什么仪式, 天空还是晴朗无云.

sentences.en: Instead, in the bright drawing - room, all seemed serene , anti - climactic, and slightly comic.
sentences.cn: 相反地, 在这光亮的客厅里, 一切都显得安详 、 平淡, 而且稍有些滑稽.

sentences.en: Louisa returned to the serene apartment of the hair - cutting character .
sentences.cn: 露意 莎回到那理发厅一般的、安静的屋子里去了.

sentences.en: She has a lovely serene face.
sentences.cn: 她有一张可爱而安详的脸.

sentences.en: She looked as calm and serene as she always did.
sentences.cn: 她看上去和以往一样平静安详。

sentences.en: She recovered her equanimity, and was an agreeable image of serene dignity.
sentences.cn: 她恢复了平静, 显得安祥端庄、神采奕奕.

sentences.en: The child, flushed and with eyes blazing, was curiously serene.
sentences.cn: 孩子虽说是脸上泛出红晕,眼睛象是一团火, 举止却异常沉着.

sentences.en: The child’s face was serene and beautiful.
sentences.cn: 这孩子的神情宁静可爱。

sentences.en: The ocean itself -- that serene and tideless sea - lay scarce less hushed.
sentences.cn: 一平如镜的安宁的海面也十分静谧.

sentences.en: The sound was so serene that it seemed unearthly.
sentences.cn: 那种声音听起来是那么宁静，仿佛天外之音。

sentences.en: The usually serene Albert had entirely lost his self - possession.
sentences.cn: 平常沉着的亚尔巴特,完全失去了他的冷静.

words.tran_cn: 平静，宁静；晴朗，风和日丽

trans.tran_cn: 沉静的，宁静的，安宁的，安详的，晴朗的，清澈的
